Name: Singapore Sling (using Old Tom gin)
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE first six ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and lightly stir.
Review: Slightly on the dry and sour side, this is decidedly more complex than most Singapore Sling recipes.
History: For more Singapore Sling recipes and the cocktails full story, see our Singapore Sling page .
Nutrition: One serving of Singapore Sling (using Old Tom gin) contains 229 calories
